sentences.sContent: As with the transition from competent to proficient, the transition to Expert is also non-linear.
sentences.sContent_eng: As with the transition from competent to proficient, the transition to Expert is also non-linear.
sentences.sCn: 正如从“胜任”到“精通”的转变一样，转变为“专家”也是非线性的过程。

sentences.sContent: It takes time to learn how to apply them and become proficient with them.
sentences.sContent_eng: It takes time to learn how to apply them and become proficient with them.
sentences.sCn: 学会如何运用它们和对它们精通会花费大量的时间。

sentences.sContent: Given the amount of time designers spend manipulating visual patterns when creating product designs, they are likely to be highly proficient in this form of pattern recognition.
sentences.sContent_eng: Given the amount of time designers spend manipulating visual patterns when creating product designs, they are likely to be highly proficient in this form of pattern recognition.
sentences.sCn: 当在创造产品设计时，设计师们在利用视觉模式上花费了大量的时间，他们可能非常精通模式识别的这种形式。

remMethod.val: pro(在…前面) + fic(做) + ient → 提前做了， 更熟练 → 熟练的， 精通的

words.tran: 专业主义；专家的地位；特性或方法
